title: Bestlite Style Floor Lamp - BL3 Black
body: The success of Bestlite by Robert Dudley Best was deafening that many designs follow after, the Bestlite Style Floor Lamp - BL3 designed in 1930 was first adopted by garages and the Royal Air Force engineering departments due to its great functionality. Public demand for the Bestlite lamps soon followed and, when Winston Churchill personally chose the Bestlite BL1 Table Lamp for his desk, Bestlite's iconic status was secured.
